Package gobblin.metrics.reporter

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    ConfiguredScheduledReporter
    Scheduled reporter with metrics reporting configuration.
    ConfiguredScheduledReporter.Builder<T extends ConfiguredScheduledReporter.Builder<T>>
    Builder for ConfiguredScheduledReporter.
    ContextAwareReporter
    Base Reporter for gobblin metrics.
    ContextAwareScheduledReporter
    A custom ScheduledReporter that is aware of the MetricContext it is associated to.
    ContextAwareScheduledReporter.Builder<R extends ContextAwareScheduledReporter,B extends ContextAwareScheduledReporter.Builder>
    A builder class for ContextAwareScheduledReporter.
    EventReporter
    Abstract class for reporting GobblinTrackingEvents at a fixed schedule.
    EventReporter.Builder<T extends EventReporter.Builder<T>>
    Builder for EventReporter.
    MetricReportReporter
    Scheduled reporter based on MetricReport.
    MetricReportReporter.Builder<T extends ConfiguredScheduledReporter.Builder<T>>
    Builder for MetricReportReporter.
    OutputStreamEventReporter
    EventReporter that writes GobblinTrackingEvents to an OutputStream.
    OutputStreamEventReporter.Builder<T extends OutputStreamEventReporter.Builder<T>>  
    OutputStreamReporter  
    OutputStreamReporter.Builder<T extends ConfiguredScheduledReporter.Builder<T>>
    A builder for OutputStreamReporter instances.
    OutputStreamReporter.BuilderImpl  
    OutputStreamReporter.Factory  
    RecursiveScheduledMetricReporter
    Reports the metrics of a MetricContext following a schedule.
    RecursiveScheduledReporter
    Reports a Metric context and all of its descendants recursively.
    ScheduledReporter
    A ContextAwareReporter that reports on a schedule.
